body:
File: src/compiler/wasm-compiler.cc (section ~7000+)
- class WasmWrapperGraphBuilder : public WasmGraphBuilder { ... } [~7071]
  - BuildJSToWasmWrapper(bool do_conversion=true, Node* frame_state=nullptr, bool set_in_wasm_flag=true) [~7733]
  - BuildWasmToJSWrapper(wasm::ImportCallKind kind, int expected_arity, wasm::Suspend suspend) [~8022]
  - Helpers: FromJS/ToJS, ModifyThreadInWasmFlagScope, BuildCallAndReturn, BuildSwitchToTheCentralStackIfNeeded/Back, BuildSuspend, AddArgumentNodes, BigIntToI64 handling, etc.
  - BuildCWasmEntry (TF path) [~... near 8800]
- BuildInlinedJSToWasmWrapper(Zone*, MachineGraph*, const CanonicalSig*, Isolate*, SourcePositionTable*, Node* frame_state, bool set_in_wasm_flag) [~8417] -> directly uses WasmWrapperGraphBuilder.BuildJSToWasmWrapper(false,...)
- NewJSToWasmCompilationJob(Isolate*, const CanonicalSig*) [~8428] -> returns Pipeline::NewWasmTurboshaftWrapperCompilationJob(... CodeKind::JS_TO_WASM_FUNCTION ...)
- CompileWasmImportCallWrapper(ImportCallKind kind, const CanonicalSig* sig, bool source_positions, int expected_arity, Suspend suspend) [~8448] -> calls Pipeline::GenerateCodeForWasmNativeStubFromTurboshaft(... CodeKind::WASM_TO_JS_FUNCTION ...)
- CompileWasmCapiCallWrapper(const CanonicalSig* sig) -> GenerateCodeForWasmNativeStubFromTurboshaft(CodeKind::WASM_TO_CAPI_FUNCTION)
Notes: This TF builder is legacy counterpart of TS wrappers. It’s used for inlining and for generating C-wasm entry, and wrapper compilation dispatch into Turboshaft pipeline. Anchors cross-reference simplified-lowering comments (compiler/simplified-lowering.cc:2246,2256) that refer to WasmWrapperGraphBuilder.
explanation: Indexes the Turbofan WasmWrapperGraphBuilder and wrapper compilation entry points in compiler/wasm-compiler.cc, including job factories and Turboshaft wrapper pipeline dispatch. This complements the TS wrappers index and shows the TF counterparts and pipeline linkage.
